Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-28834 affecting package gnutls for versions less than 3.7.11-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-28834 affecting package gnutls for versions less than 3.7.11-1. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package gnutls is earlier than 3.7.11-1, affected by CVE-2024-28834
